messages.messageBody:
I've searched off and on for a couple days, but haven't found exactly what
I need, so I'm hoping someone here may already have it? I need some links
(not books cause he won't read them) to articles or whathaveyou aimed at
fathers, about treating children respectfully.

TIA!
